TopicTitle: Can anyone list down all the add-on mod resources for KSP?

Articles.Content:
I would like to know the resources that are added by the mod community, so that I could use them in my own mod plugins (in the future).

Edited July 18, 2020 by RandomKerbal

Good on you for asking that question   Too many people have not asked themselves that question over the years, resulting in lots of duplicate and/or conflicting resouces across various mods. There is no list of all modded resources for the same reason. It would be impossible to keep up with everything.

There is, however, a mod project that was created to fix this very problem. It is called Community Resource Pack. You can make it a dependency for your future mods, and use any resource it defines. That will automatically make your mods compatible with all other mods that also rely on CRP resources. There are a lot of resources provided, curated by a group of prolific modders. The base definitions are all in CommonResources.cfg of the mod.
Hello @RandomKerbal, your question has been moved to add-on discussions.

12 minutes ago, Streetwind said:

That will automatically make your mods compatible with all other mods that also rely on CRP resources. There are a lot of resources provided, curated by a group of prolific modders. The base definitions are all in CommonResources.cfg of the mod.

Thanks

Simplex Resources also adds resources.

HydrateOre, NaturalOre, RareOre, and Saturate.

Along with MetalParts, CustomParts for extraplanetary launchpad

Along with Consumables, OrganicSlurry, Air and BadAir for Kerbalism Simplex.
